data.actual_result: If doesn't let you scroll, you have to make the split screen bigger to choose the last option, I think in smaller screens it get a little bit worse
data.expected_result: It should be able to scroll the filter, even if it only have a option and you can make the split screen bigger to solve it. But it can be a little bit worse in smaller screens
data.short_description: You can't scroll the channel search filter if it's in smaller split screen
data.steps_to_repro: - Put the discord in split screen and reduce even more - Click the channel finder icon, the first one in the user, config and mention bar - Click the filter and it doesn't scroll
